talk.author: did:plc:zrz2librmtf77rhll3cukn3e
talk.utter:
They said that it is there, its connection to obscure WWII history in America, and how it was built in a place that was intentionally hidden from the public.
If I recall correctly, one mentioned that it has been featured in a few Discovery and History Channel shows.

talk.author: did:plc:zrz2librmtf77rhll3cukn3e
talk.utter:
I am very aware of what is happening at the Getty.
Though, I very much appreciate your updates.

Myself and many others in the art, architecture, and cultural heritage communities have been keeping an eye out and staying in contact as best as possible since the fires started with them and others.

talk.author: did:plc:zrz2librmtf77rhll3cukn3e
talk.utter:
So many hidden and open Nazi supporters in America during WWII.

I haven't seen it myself in person, but I have been told that there is something similar to this in Upstate New York.

Overall, it's so eerie how these Nazi sympathizers built these compounds, with their plans and agendas.

talk.author: did:plc:tuhlyhkol7yxkh5q3mykjqe4
talk.utter:
It was built in the 30s so the couple were actual Hitler supporters in real time. They were, allegedly building it for for his supporters. It was raided once.

Someone should really do a movie

talk.author: did:plc:tuhlyhkol7yxkh5q3mykjqe4
talk.utter:
Yes, it's winter

Our fire season is fall & early winter, eso if we're in drought conditions.

We've not had major rain in months & we're having a wind condition that comes from the high desert so very dry, strong winds blowing toward the Pacific

talk.author: did:plc:zrz2librmtf77rhll3cukn3e

Rather than trying to move works, they instead have ways to seal off those works from fire. talk.author: did:plc:tuhlyhkol7yxkh5q3mykjqe4
talk.utter:
The newer Getty planned for fire risks before it was even built, bec it's in a canyon (the Sepulveda Pass) surrounded by hills & brush. 

It is a few miles east of the eastern evacuation border. Fingers crossed the wind doesn't shift. 

There was a big fire a few years ago that was very close to it

talk.author: did:plc:tuhlyhkol7yxkh5q3mykjqe4
talk.utter:
And while climate change is real, wildfires were happening here eons before humans were living here

Same with our mudslides when we have big rains (esp in a season following wildfires)

They're what nature does.

It does not make it any easier for anyone, though
